description: Try our easy to follow Kofta kebabs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Mince,Egg free,Tomato,Sesame free,Beef
name: Kofta kebabs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place onion, garlic, pine nuts, mint and coriander into a food processor. Process until finely chopped. Add mince and process to combine. Transfer to a bowl.
Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.
Add cumin, coriander, paprika, tomato paste and currants to mince mixture. Season with salt and pepper and stir until combined. Form 2 tbs of the mixture into sausage shapes and thread onto skewers.

Heat oil in a large nonstick frying pan over a medium-high heat. Add the skewers, in batches, and cook for 8 minutes or until golden on all sides. Transfer to baking tray. Bake for 10 minutes or until cooked through.
Combine tomato, cucumber, extra mint, lemon rind, 2 tbs of lemon juice and oil in a bowl. Spoon onto a platter. Top with skewers. Serve with tzatziki.
